alert.note: Alert for Claiborne; Copiah; Hinds; Issaquena; Madison; Rankin; Simpson; Warren; Yazoo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 11 at 1:25PM CDT until May 11 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Warren County in west central Mississippi... Rankin County in central Mississippi... Western Simpson County in central Mississippi... Claiborne County in southwestern Mississippi... Southwestern Yazoo County in central Mississippi... Hinds County in central Mississippi... East central Issaquena County in west central Mississippi... Copiah County in central Mississippi... Madison County in central Mississippi... * Until 300 PM CDT. * At 125 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles east of Valley Park to near Oak Ridge to near Newman to near Port Gibson, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Bovina, Newman, Youngton, Flowers and Oak Ridge around 130 PM CDT. Edwards, Learned, Peyton and Phoenix around 140 PM CDT. Bolton around 150 PM CDT. Raymond and Barlow around 155 PM CDT. Jackson, Clinton, Flora, Bentonia and Pocahontas around 200 PM CDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CDT for southwestern and west central Mississippi. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for central and south central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Claiborne; Copiah; Hinds; Issaquena; Madison; Rankin; Simpson; Warren; Yazoo
